extension.name: FavEffects
extension.author: FavThemes
extension.description: Responsive FavEffects Joomla!3 Module

field.name: showIcon1
field.label: Show Icon 1
field.description: Choose if this icon and its title should be displayed or not.

field.name: effectIcon1
field.label: Icon 1 Effect
field.description: Choose a CSS3 effect for the icon.

field.name: iconLink1
field.label: Icon 1 Link
field.description: Insert the link for this icon. Note that the link must include http:// (for example: http://favthemes.com/, not favthemes.com).

field.name: iconLinkTarget1
field.label: Icon 1 Target
field.description: Select the target of the URL

field.name: bgColorIcon1
field.label: Icon 1 Background Color
field.description: The color for the background of the icon. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: borderWidthIcon1
field.label: Icon 1 Border Width
field.description: Choose the border width for the background of the icon. Please insert the number using pixels (for example: 14px, not 14).

field.name: borderTypeIcon1
field.label: Icon 1 Border Type
field.description: Choose the border type of the background of the icon.

field.name: borderColorIcon1
field.label: Icon 1 Border Color
field.description: The color for the border of the background of the icon. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: borderRadiusIcon1
field.label: Icon 1 Border Radius
field.description: Choose the border-radius for the background of the icon. Note that this option does not work in IE7-8 due to lack of border-radius support. Please insert the number using pixels (for example: 14px, not 14).

field.name: nameIcon1
field.label: Icon 1 Name
field.description: Insert the Font Awesome icon name. For example: fa-camera or fa-arrow.

field.name: colorIcon1
field.label: Icon 1 Color
field.description: The color for the icon. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: fontSizeIcon1
field.label: Icon 1 Font Size
field.description: Set the font size for the icon. Please insert the number using pixels or em (for example: 14px, not 14).

field.name: titleText1
field.label: Icon 1 Title
field.description: Insert text for title of the icon

field.name: titleColor1
field.label: Title Color
field.description: The color for the title of the icon. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: titleGoogleFont1
field.label: Title Google Web Font
field.description: Copy the Google Web Font name here, for example Open Sans or Open Sans.

field.name: titleFontSize1
field.label: Title Font Size
field.description: Set the font size for the title of the icon. Please insert the number using pixels or em (for example: 14px, not 14).
